citations.narrative:
An acquisition record dated 02 October 2025 of a Macaw Hybrid is incomplete. The record is missing the name, address,
vehicle plate number and state, and driver's license number and state of the individual from whom the animal was
acquired. The licensee stated the individual was not USDA licensed or registered. Complete and accurate records are
required to ensure effective animal tracking and to maintain compliance with the Animal Welfare Act (AWA) and its
regulations.
The licensee shall make, keep, and maintain records or forms which fully disclose the information concerning animals,
purchased or otherwise acquired, owned, held, leased, or otherwise in his or her possession or under his or her control, or
which is transported, sold, euthanized, or otherwise disposed of by that dealer or exhibitor.
Correct from this date forward of 14 January 2026.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
An acquisition record dated 02 October 2025 of a Macaw Hybrid is incomplete. The record is missing the name, address, 
vehicle plate number and state, and driver's license number and state of the individual from whom the animal was 
acquired. The licensee stated the individual was not USDA licensed or registered. Complete and accurate records are 
required to ensure effective animal tracking and to maintain compliance with the Animal Welfare Act (AWA) and its 
regulations. 
 
The licensee shall make, keep, and maintain records or forms which fully disclose the information concerning animals, 
purchased or otherwise acquired, owned, held, leased, or otherwise in his or her possession or under his or her control, or 
which is transported, sold, euthanized, or otherwise disposed of by that dealer or exhibitor. 
 
Correct from this date forward of 14 January 2026. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
